Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
♻️ Migrate entire codebase from @ObservableObject to @Observable

Comprehensive migration of all 36 ObservableObject classes to Swift''s modern
@Observable macro for better performance and cleaner code.

## Classes Migrated \(36 total\)

**Tier 1 - Complex \(20+ properties\):**
- SettingsManager \(22 props\) - Global app settings
- TalkieLiveSettings \(23 props\) - Live recording config  
- OnboardingCoordinator \(26 props\) - Onboarding flow
- InterstitialManager \(24 props\) - Notification management

**Tier 2 - High Complexity \(8-9 properties\):**
- TalkieLiveMonitor, TalkieServiceMonitor
- MemosViewModel, EngineClient

**Tier 3 - Medium Complexity \(4-7 properties\):**
- WhisperService, SpeechSynthesisService, SessionLayoutManager
- AudioPlaybackManager, CloudKitSyncManager, TalkieLiveStateMonitor
- ServiceLifecycleManager, PerformanceMonitor, EphemeralTranscriber

**Tier 4 - Simple \(1-3 properties\):**
- ProcessDiscovery, QuickOpenService, AppLauncher
- SystemEventManager, WorkflowManager, AppleSpeechService
- DictationStore, AutoRunProcessor, PermissionsManager
- AppLogger, CloudKitSyncEngine, WorkflowExecutor
- SyncStatusManager, ParakeetService, LLMProviderRegistry
- PendingActionsManager, MLXModelManager, AudioDeviceManager
- RecordingController

## Key Changes

**Migration Pattern:**
- Removed @Published wrappers \(235+ properties\)
- Added @Observable macro to all classes
- Updated 50+ view files \(@ObservedObject/@StateObject → @State\)

**Performance Optimizations:**
- Added @ObservationIgnored to 18 implementation details \(timers, caches, observers\)
- Views now only update when actual UI state changes

**Reliability:**
- Added defensive deinit blocks to 4 critical classes
- Proper cleanup of timers, processes, and observers

**Compatibility Fixes:**
- Converted Combine $ bindings to .onChange\(of:\) patterns
- Fixed async connection waiting in EngineClient
- Removed problematic deinit blocks from @MainActor classes

## Benefits

✅ Better performance - Granular update tracking \(only affected views re-render\)
✅ Less boilerplate - No @Published annotations needed
✅ Type safety - Automatic observation without manual objectWillChange
✅ Modern Swift - Following Swift 5.9+ best practices
